column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This place is super romantic and has a great atmosphere. The drinks are incredible
column2: and you can tell they put a lot of care into them. Even the free bread they bring out was the best sourdough bread that I've ever had. The steaks are very good and flavorful
column3: and the desserts are heavenly. The lemon meringue pie was the most flavorful amazing dish. Definitely a must try. It is a great place for a date!
